mapper.select: SELECT dgs.id, dgs.group_id AS groupId, dgs.name, dgs.status, dgs.cnt, dgs.type, dgs.combine, dg.name AS groupName, dgs.desc, dgs.cover_img AS coverImg, dgs.sum_price AS sumPrice, dgs.scope, dgs.max_cnt_per_cus AS maxCntPerCus, dgs.goods_item_type_cnt AS goodsItemTypeCnt, dgs.serial_number AS serialNumber, dgs.cover_img AS coverImg, dgs.expire_month_cnt AS expireMonthCnt FROM dgs LEFT JOIN d_group dg ON dg.id = dgs.group_id WHERE dgs.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( name, status, combine, `type`, `desc`, cnt, goods_item_type_cnt, `scope`, max_cnt_per_cus, sum_price, group_id, serial_number, cover_img, effective_date, expire_date, expire_month_cnt, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{status}, #{combine}, #{type}, #{desc}, #{cnt}, #{goodsItemTypeCnt}, #{scope}, #{maxCntPerCus}, #{sumPrice}, #{groupId}, #{serialNumber}, #{coverImg}, #{effectiveDate}, #{expireDate}, #{expireMonthCnt}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
